block.p: Cindy Robin Breslawsky, the daughter of Debbie and Marc Breslawsky of Weston, Conn., was married yesterday to Jason Edward Drahzal, the son of Ellen Bragan of Punta Gorda, Fla., and John Drahzal of Brewster, N.Y. Roger Sirlin, the village justice for Mamaroneck, N.Y., and an uncle of the bride, officiated at Tappan Hill in Tarrytown, N.Y.

Mrs. Drahzal, 27, is a marketing associate in the White Plains office of K-force.com, a Web-based firm that lists jobs online. She graduated from Hartwick College. Her father is the president and chief operating officer of Pitney Bowes, the postage meter manufacturing company in Stamford, Conn.. Her mother is a sales consultant in Stamford for CB Richard Ellis, a commercial real estate firm.

Cindy Robin Breslawsky, the daughter of Debbie and Marc Breslawsky of Weston, Conn., was married yesterday to Jason Edward Drahzal, the son of Ellen Bragan of Punta Gorda, Fla., and John Drahzal of Brewster, N.Y. Roger Sirlin, the village justice for Mamaroneck, N.Y., and an uncle of the bride, officiated at Tappan Hill in Tarrytown, N.Y.

Mrs. Drahzal, 27, is a marketing associate in the White Plains office of K-force.com, a Web-based firm that lists jobs online. She graduated from Hartwick College. Her father is the president and chief operating officer of Pitney Bowes, the postage meter manufacturing company in Stamford, Conn.. Her mother is a sales consultant in Stamford for CB Richard Ellis, a commercial real estate firm.

Mr. Drahzal, 29, is a computer-aided design technician at the Pitney Bowes office in Shelton, Conn. He graduated from Pace University at Pleasantville, N.Y. His father is a vice president and consulting manager at Tech Software, a company in Manhasset, N.Y., that provides advice to Internet start-up businesses. The bridegroom is the stepson Nancy Drahzal.
